title: 活动标题
desc: 活动描述
desc_tw: 活动描述
desc_en: 活动描述
desc_kr: 活动描述
remark: 活动备注
remark_tw: 活动备注
remark_en: 活动备注
remark_kr: 活动备注

title: More Daily Dungeon attempts
desc: During the event, all Daily Dungeons grant more challenge attempts.
desc_tw: 活動期間，所有日常副本內的內容每個均增加挑戰次數
desc_en: During the event, all Daily Dungeons grant more challenge attempts.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간, 모든 일일 던전 한번 씩 도전 횟수 증가
remark: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus for both events is effective simultaneously. Attempts can be stacked for Dungeons affected in both events.
remark_tw: 若與平常日常活動同期，則在兩個活動同時生效，兩個活動均有加成次數的該活動副本，將疊加所有活動的次數
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus for both events is effective simultaneously. Attempts can be stacked for Dungeons affected in both events.
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에 모든 일일 던전의 내용의 도전 횟수가 모두 증가

title: Double Rewards for Road of Adventure Raid
title_en: Double Rewards for Road of Adventure Raid
desc: During the event, rewards for Road of Adventure Raid doubled.
desc_tw: 活動期間，冒險之路掃蕩獎勵翻倍
desc_en: During the event, rewards for Road of Adventure Raid doubled.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간, 모험의 길  소탕 보상을 2배로 획득할 수 있다
remark: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus and duration cannot be stacked.
remark_tw: 若與日常活動同期，則不進行兩個活動的倍數與時間等條件的疊加哦
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus and duration cannot be stacked.
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에, 모험의 길 소탕 보상이 2배가 됩니다

title: Double Story Dungeon Drops
desc: With event's valid attempts, Story Dungeon drops doubled.
desc_tw: 活動次數內，劇情副本産出內容翻倍
desc_en: With event's valid attempts, Story Dungeon drops doubled.
desc_kr: 이벤트  횟수 내에서, 스토리 던전 보상을 2배로 획득할 수 있다
remark: Both Raid and Fight are counted. If it coincides with Daily Stage Double-drops Event, the duration for Daily Event will be counted first, and then the attempts of this event.
remark_tw: 掃蕩與戰鬥都在計數內，若與日常關卡翻倍活動同期，則先按照日常活動的時間計算，之後再計算被活動次數
remark_en: Both Raid and Fight are counted. If it coincides with Daily Stage Double-drops Event, the duration for Daily Event will be counted first, and then the attempts of this event.
remark_kr: 이벤트 횟수 안에 스토리 던전에서 생성되는 내용물이 2배가 됩니다

title: Double Purchased Stamina
desc: During the event, first 5 purchases of Stamina every day grant double Stamina.
desc_tw: 活動期間，每日前5次購買體力享受獲得體力雙倍
desc_en: During the event, first 5 purchases of Stamina every day grant double Stamina.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간, 매일 5회 체력을 구입해 체력의 2배를 획득할 수 있다
remark: If it coincides with Daily Double Purchased Stamina Event, carry out the event with higher purchase attempts
remark_tw: 若與日常體力購買雙倍活動同期，則按照購買次數多的該活動執行
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Double Purchased Stamina Event, carry out the event with higher purchase attempts
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에 매일 첫 5회 체력 구매 시 2배 체력 혜택을 누릴 수 있습니다

title: Double Coins
desc: During the event, first 8 Fortunes every day grant double Coins.
desc_tw: 活動期間，每日前8次聚寶可以獲得雙倍金幣
desc_en: During the event, first 8 Fortunes every day grant double Coins.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간 , 매일 전 8회 보물단지   금화의 2배를 획득할 수 있다
remark: If it coincides with Daily Double Fortune Event, carry out the event with higher attempts
remark_tw: 若與日常聚寶翻倍活動同期，則優先進行翻倍次數多的活動
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Double Fortune Event, carry out the event with higher attempts
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에, 매일 첫 8회 보물단지에서 2배 코인을 얻을 수 있습니다

title: Double Coins
desc: During the event, first 8 Fortunes every day grant double Coins.
desc_tw: 活動期間，每日前10次聚寶可以獲得雙倍金幣
desc_en: During the event, first 8 Fortunes every day grant double Coins.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간 , 매일 전 10회 보물단지   금화의 2배를 획득할 수 있다
remark: If it coincides with Daily Double Fortune Event, carry out the event with higher attempts
remark_tw: 若與日常聚寶翻倍活動同期，則優先進行翻倍次數多的活動
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Double Fortune Event, carry out the event with higher attempts
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에, 매일 첫 8회 보물단지에서 2배 코인을 얻을 수 있습니다

title: More Daily Dungeon attempts
desc: During the event, all Daily Dungeons grant more challenge attempts.
desc_tw: 活動期間，所有日常副本內的內容每個均增加挑戰次數
desc_en: During the event, all Daily Dungeons grant more challenge attempts.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간, 모든 일일 던전 한번 씩 도전 횟수 증가
remark: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus for both events is effective simultaneously. Attempts can be stacked for Dungeons affected in both events.
remark_tw: 若與平常日常活動同期，則在兩個活動同時生效，兩個活動均有加成次數的該活動副本，將疊加所有活動的次數
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus for both events is effective simultaneously. Attempts can be stacked for Dungeons affected in both events.
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에 모든 일일 던전의 내용의 도전 횟수가 모두 증가

title: Double Rewards for Road of Adventure Raid
title_en: Double Rewards for Road of Adventure Raid
desc: During the event, rewards for Road of Adventure Raid doubled.
desc_tw: 活動期間，冒險之路掃蕩獎勵翻倍
desc_en: During the event, rewards for Road of Adventure Raid doubled.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간, 모험의 길  소탕 보상을 2배로 획득할 수 있다
remark: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus and duration cannot be stacked.
remark_tw: 若與日常活動同期，則不進行兩個活動的倍數與時間等條件的疊加哦
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Event, the bonus and duration cannot be stacked.
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에, 모험의 길 소탕 보상이 2배가 됩니다

title: Double Story Dungeon Drops
desc: With event's valid attempts, Story Dungeon drops doubled.
desc_tw: 活動次數內，劇情副本産出內容翻倍
desc_en: With event's valid attempts, Story Dungeon drops doubled.
desc_kr: 이벤트  횟수 내에서, 스토리 던전 보상을 2배로 획득할 수 있다
remark: Both Raid and Fight are counted. If it coincides with Daily Stage Double-drops Event, the duration for Daily Event will be counted first, and then the attempts of this event.
remark_tw: 掃蕩與戰鬥都在計數內，若與日常關卡翻倍活動同期，則先按照日常活動的時間計算，之後再計算被活動次數
remark_en: Both Raid and Fight are counted. If it coincides with Daily Stage Double-drops Event, the duration for Daily Event will be counted first, and then the attempts of this event.
remark_kr: 이벤트 횟수 안에 스토리 던전에서 생성되는 내용물이 2배가 됩니다

title: Double Purchased Stamina
desc: During the event, first 5 purchases of Stamina every day grant double Stamina.
desc_tw: 活動期間，每日前5次購買體力享受獲得體力雙倍
desc_en: During the event, first 5 purchases of Stamina every day grant double Stamina.
desc_kr: 이벤트 기간, 매일 5회 체력을 구입해 체력의 2배를 획득할 수 있다
remark: If it coincides with Daily Double Purchased Stamina Event, carry out the event with higher purchase attempts
remark_tw: 若與日常體力購買雙倍活動同期，則按照購買次數多的該活動執行
remark_en: If it coincides with Daily Double Purchased Stamina Event, carry out the event with higher purchase attempts
remark_kr: 이벤트 기간에 매일 첫 5회 체력 구매 시 2배 체력 혜택을 누릴 수 있습니다
